### Directions

#### GitHub Pages

Graded separately, finalize your portfolio site with 1 project from this class and 1 project from another class. Remove an extra material. **15 points**

#### Interpolation with Regression Lab

See the sample project. **32 points**

### Grading

-   GitHub portion (15 points)
-   Part 1 (8 points) - Make maps from [Interpolation from R Spatial](https://rspatial.org/analysis/4-interpolation.html)
-   Part 2 (8 points) - Answer questions (see sample project)
-   Part 3 (8 points) - Make maps (exclude graphics) from [Chapter Spatial Regression from R Spatial](https://rspatial.org/analysis/7-spregression.html)
-   Part 4 (8 points) - Answer questions (see sample project)

### Turn-in

::: {.alert .alert-info}
### What to turn-in

**Turn in a single PDF.** - On the first page, please include a short header. - Complete the exercises and produce a polished map. - The output of your Qmd should be an HTML, which you then open and print to PDF.
